hadiths.text: It was narrated that Al-Fadl bin 'Abbas said:"The Messenger of Allah(ﷺ)visited Al Abbas in some land of ours outside the city, and we had a small dog and a donkey which was grazing. The Messenger of Allah(ﷺ) prayed Asr and they were in front of him, and they were not shooed away or pushed away

chapter.ara-name: باب ذِكْرِ مَا يَقْطَعُ الصَّلاَةَ وَمَا لاَ يَقْطَعُ إِذَا لَمْ يَكُنْ بَيْنَ يَدَىِ الْمُصَلِّي سُتْرَةٌ
chapter.eng-name: Mention of what interrupts the prayer and what does not if a praying person does not have a Sutra in front of him
